dek: Stunning skyline vistas meet glamorous decor at a Manhattan penthouse by design duo Dufner Heighes

items.title: dam-images-architecture-2015-10-urban-idyll-manhattan-penthouse-01.jpg
items.caption: The design firm [Dufner Heighes](http://dufnerheighes.com/) conceived this Manhattan penthouse for a Chicago-based family. In the living area, a pair of [Michael Berman Limited](http://michaelbermanlimited.com/) club chairs from [Profiles](http://www.profilesny.net/) and a [Holly Hunt](https://www.hollyhunt.com/default.aspx) sofa upholstered in a [Holland & Sherry](http://www.hollandandsherry.com/) wool-mohair surround an [Ado Chale](http://www.adochale.com/) cocktail table; the mirror is by [BDDW](http://bddw.com/), the credenza and tripod floor lamp are by [Christian Liaigre](http://www.christian-liaigre.us/en/), the [Jim Zivic](http://jimzivicdesign.com/) athracite side table is from [Ralph Pucci International](http://www.ralphpucci.net/), and the custom-made rug is by [ALT for Living](http://www.altforliving.com/).

items.title: dam-images-architecture-2015-10-urban-idyll-manhattan-penthouse-02.jpg
items.caption: [Bec Brittain](http://www.becbrittain.com/) pendant lamps hang above the dining table, which is grouped with [Vladimir Kagan](http://www.vladimirkagan.com/) chairs from [Ralph Pucci International](http://www.ralphpucci.net/). Visible through the windows is a Kiki Smith sculpture installed beside a staircase that leads to the rooftop terrace.

items.title: dam-images-architecture-2015-10-urban-idyll-manhattan-penthouse-03.jpg
items.caption: An Hervé Van der Straeten sconce from [Maison Gerard](http://maisongerard.com/) punctuates a hallway whose walls are coated in Venetian plaster.

items.title: dam-images-architecture-2015-10-urban-idyll-manhattan-penthouse-05.jpg
items.caption: In the breakfast area, a table from [Holly Hunt](https://www.hollyhunt.com/default.aspx) and Hans Wegner chairs are arranged beneath a Poul Henningsen pendant light; the painting is by Tom Cassidy, and the credenza and [Tai Ping](http://taipingcarpets.com/) carpet were custom made.

items.title: dam-images-architecture-2015-10-urban-idyll-manhattan-penthouse-04.jpg
items.caption: Marble surfaces complement [Bulthaup](http://www.bulthaup.com/) cabinetry in the kitchen, which is equipped with [Miele](http://www.miele.com/en/com/index.htm) wall ovens, a [Gaggenau](http://www.gaggenau.com/us/) cooktop, [Dornbracht](http://www.dornbracht.com/) sink fittings, and a [Sub-Zero](http://www.subzero-wolf.com/) wine refrigerator; the [Suite NY](http://www.suiteny.com/) stools are clad in a [Holland & Sherry](http://www.hollandandsherry.com/) fabric.

items.title: dam-images-architecture-2015-10-urban-idyll-manhattan-penthouse-06.jpg
items.caption:
For the sprawling rooftop terrace, [Dufner Heighes](http://dufnerheighes.com/) devised a cantilevered mahogany awning and coordinating planters; the sconces are from [YLighting](http://www.ylighting.com), the tables and chairs are by Richard Schultz for [Knoll](http://www.knoll.com/), and the poufs are by [CB2](http://www.cb2.com/). The plantings were designed by the Brooklyn-based 

 landscape firm [Future Green Studio](http://futuregreenstudio.com/).

items.title: dam-images-architecture-2015-10-urban-idyll-manhattan-penthouse-15.jpg
items.caption: A brick hearth anchors the terrace’s lounge area.

items.title: dam-images-architecture-2015-10-urban-idyll-manhattan-penthouse-13.jpg
items.caption: Climbing vines camouflage the apartment building’s mechanical tower. The rooftop terrace boasts its own weatherproof kitchen for alfresco entertaining.

items.title: dam-images-architecture-2015-10-urban-idyll-manhattan-penthouse-10.jpg
items.caption: Striped walls lend graphic punch to the gym.

items.title: dam-images-architecture-2015-10-urban-idyll-manhattan-penthouse-07.jpg
items.caption: A limited-edition [Damien Hirst](http://www.damienhirst.com/) wallpaper lines the master suite’s hallway, which displays a metal-and-mirror sculpture by [John Erik Karkula](http://karkula.com/).

items.title: dam-images-architecture-2015-10-urban-idyll-manhattan-penthouse-08.jpg
items.caption: Travertine wall panels and a geometric stone-tile floor lend warm tones to the master bath; the vintage light fixture is by Angelo Lelli, the framed collage is by Mark Welsh, the tub is by [Wetstyle](http://www.wetstyle.ca/), and the tub fittings are by [Kallista](http://www.kallista.com/).

items.title: dam-images-architecture-2015-10-urban-idyll-manhattan-penthouse-09.jpg
items.caption: The master bedroom’s [Vladimir Kagan](http://www.vladimirkagan.com/) sofa and chair, both from [Ralph Pucci International](http://www.ralphpucci.net/), are upholstered in fabrics by [Romo](http://www.romo.com/) and [Holland & Sherry](http://www.hollandandsherry.com), respectively; the curtains are also of a Romo fabric, the cocktail table and credenza are by [Roman Thomas](http://www.romanthomas.com), the silk duvet is by [Ann Gish](http://anngish.com/), and the rug was custom made by [Rosemary Hallgarten](http://www.rosemaryhallgarten.com/).

items.title: dam-images-architecture-2015-10-urban-idyll-manhattan-penthouse-14.jpg
items.caption: Another view of the master bedroom’s sitting area.
